DESCRIPTION: Requesting stored data for guild. Only guild owner can get data. Can get data only one time for 15 days.
COOLDOWN: You can only get data again on `%date%`
EMAIL_PROVIDE: Provide email to send server information
CONFIRM:
Do you really want send stored data to email **`%email%`**? You can get data again only after %days% days.

Type *`yes`* for confirmation or *`no`* to refuse.
SENT: We have saved your request to send server data to `%email%`. Soon you will receive a letter with a file.
REFUSED: You have refused to send data.
